h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Be wary of ambushes from Frozen Corpses that will try to hamper your battles with the Red-Haired Yaksha, and engage them cautiously when you feel like you have the upper hand. Once he's out of the way, grab the green Wisp and then head up the broken wooden ramp.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
Be wary of ambushes from Frozen Corpses that will try to hamper your battles with the Red-Haired Yaksha, and engage them cautiously when you feel like you have the upper hand. Once he's out of the way, grab the green Wisp and then head up the broken wooden ramp.
